[p]A [b]heart opening[/b] can be defined as the experience of the function of one or more specific receptor sets or “mental organs” coming into the forefront of a person’s subjective perception, through the use of psychoactive compounds. The intensity of this experience is proportional to the extent at which the mental organs associated receptor sets are being modulated, ranging from subtle in their presence to overwhelming and impossible to ignore.[/p]

[p]Depending on the mental organ which is being manifested into consciousness, a variety of differing arrays of subjective effects may present themselves. These are listed and described in a comprehensive level of detail below.[/p]
[hr opacity="0.5" /]
[columns]
  [column]
[headered-textbox label="5-HT1" header="serotonin 1A receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"]
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]“[i]Language, logic, reason, concepts, thought, patterns in nature[/i]”[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/analysis-enhancement"]analysis enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/analysis-suppression"]analysis suppression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/language-enhancement"]language enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/language-suppression"]language suppression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/thought-organization"]thought organization[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/thought-disorganization"]thought disorganization[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/thought-connectivity"]thought connectivity[/int-link][/i]…?[/p]
[/headered-textbox]

[headered-textbox label="β" header="beta-adrenergic receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"]
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]“[i]Home, family, community, society, humanity, joy[/i]”[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/empathy-affection-and-sociability-enhancement"]empathy, affection, and sociability enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/introspection"]introspection[/int-link] (of a specifically interpersonal nature), [int-link to="/effects/cognitive euphoria"]cognitive euphoria[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/increased-sense-of-humor"]increased sense of humor[/int-link][/i]…?[/p]
[/headered-textbox]
 
[headered-textbox label="H1" header="Histamine H1 receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"]
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]“[i]Empathy; dynamic, persistent, and cumulative theory of mind[/i]”[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/empathy-affection-and-sociability-enhancement"]empathy, affection, and sociability enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/introspection"]introspection[/int-link] (of a specifically interpersonal nature)...?[/i][/p]
[/headered-textbox]

[headered-textbox label="α2" header="alpha-2 adrenergic receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"]
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]“[i]Sense of the essence or soul of things (rasa), or events shaping one’s self[/i]”[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/conceptual-thinking"]conceptual thinking[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/personal-bias-suppression"]personal bias suppression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/ego-death"]ego death[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/existential-self-realization"]existential self realization[/int-link][/i]…?[/p]
[/headered-textbox]
[/column]

[column]
[headered-textbox label="α1" header="alpha-1 adrenergic receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"]
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]"[i]Sense of continuity, history, flow of events[/i]"[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/time-distortion?s=time-dilation"]time dilation[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/time-distortion?s=time-compression"]time compression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/time-distortion?s=a-temporality"]a-temporality[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/perception-of-eternalism"]perception of eternalism[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/time-distortion?s=time-reversal"]time reversal[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/memory-suppression"]memory suppression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/introspection"]introspection[/int-link] (of a specifically retrospective nature)[/i]...?[/p]
[/headered-textbox]
 
[headered-textbox label="D" header="dopamine receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"]
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]“[i]Meaning, significance, awe, and certainty; integration[/i]”[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/novelty-enhancement"]novelty enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/personal-meaning-enhancement"]personal meaning enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/conceptual-thinking"]conceptual thinking[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/personal-bias-suppression"]personal bias suppression[/int-link][/i]…?[/p][/headered-textbox]

[headered-textbox label="I" header="imidazoline receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"] 
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]“[i]Ecstasy, empathy, openness, compassion, peace, acceptance, forgiveness, healing, oneness, caring; letting go of anger, grudge, guilt, shame, anxiety; ability to safely experience and contemplate mental pain[/i]”[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/emotional-euphoria"]emotional euphoria[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/physical-euphoria"]physical euphoria[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/emotion-enhancement"]emotion enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/empathy-affection-and-sociability-enhancement"]empathy, affection, and sociability enhancement[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/catharsis"]catharsis[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/introspection"]introspection[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/anxiety-suppression"]anxiety suppression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/unity-and-interconnectedness"]unity and interconnectedness[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/mindfulness"]mindfulness[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/depression-reduction"]depression reduction[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/addiction-reduction"]addiction reduction[/int-link][/i]…?[/p]
[/headered-textbox]

[headered-textbox label="μ" header="μ-opioid receptor" labelBackground="#878786" headerBackground="#F0F0F0"]
[p]HYPOTHESIZED FUNCTION[/p]
[p]“[i]Comfort, security, peace, gentleness; dissipation of pain, hunger, tension, anxiety, frustration, fear, anger and aggression; Edenic[/i]”[/p]
[p]POTENTIALLY ASSOCIATED SUBJECTIVE EFFECTS[/p]
[p][i][int-link to="/effects/anxiety-suppression"]anxiety suppression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/physical-euphoria"]physical euphoria[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/pain-reduction"]pain reduction[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/appetite suppression"]appetite suppression[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/emotional euphoria"]emotional euphoria[/int-link], [int-link to="/effects/muscle relaxation"]muscle relaxation[/int-link][/i]…?[/p]
[/headered-textbox]
[/column]
[/columns]
[hr opacity="0.5" /]
